Articles.Content:
• Version

Stock Ksp2 Version 0.1.0.0.20892

  • OS/Specs

Windows 11, Ryzen 7 3700X, RX 6600 XT, 16 GB RAM

  • Bug Description

After stage separation on a stratolaunch launch, KSP sets the target as the CoM between the original carrier plane and the strato-payload. When the payload leaves phys range/stages (I'm not sure of the cause), it destroys both vessels. 

  • Video

https://clipchamp.com/watch/9jbxBckb0at

 

I'm not sure of any workarounds at this moment.
I had the same bug several times, it started after loading saves for flying crafts in my cases
